placeholder.host: Host where Arrowhead Core Service is available (e.g. https://172.17.10.219.
placeholder.port: Port where Arrowhead Core Service is available (e.g. 8443).
placeholder.path: Path where Arrowhead Core Service is available (e.g. /serviceregistry)
placeholder.name: Configuration node name.
placeholder.useTLS: Use TLS to connect with the service.
placeholder.TLSConfig: TLS Configuration to connect with the service
